n: Banana Berry Smoothie with TruviaÂ® Natural Sweetener
des: "Break out the blender for a fun and delicious treat. A refreshing smoothie where the goodness of yogurt mingles with berries, bananas and OJ. Naturally satisfying any time of day. This smoothie has 20% fewer calories and 30% less sugar than the full-sugar version."
ins:
Add all ingredients to blender. Blend on high until smooth.
Enjoy.
